Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The application ID of the application producing the record.
Columns.Name: ApplicationId

Columns.Description: The ID of the stage.
Columns.Name: StageId

Columns.Description: The name of the stage.
Columns.Name: StageName

Columns.Description: The Id of the stage attempt.
Columns.Name: AttemptId

Columns.Description: The count of tasks associated with the stage.
Columns.Name: TaskCount

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) the stage was submitted.
Columns.Name: SubmissionTime

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) the stage was completed.
Columns.Name: CompletionTime

Columns.Description: The reason for failure if the stage failed.
Columns.Name: FailureReason

Columns.Description: The exception details for any stage failures.
Columns.Name: Details

Columns.Description: Json containing information about RDDs used in the stage.
Columns.Name: RDDInfo

Columns.Description: The tenant ID of the cluster running the stage.
Columns.Name: ClusterTenantId

Columns.Description: The type of node  running the stage.
Columns.Name: Role

Columns.Description: The FQDN of the host.
Columns.Name: Host

Columns.Description: The DNS name of the cluster running the stage.
Columns.Name: ClusterDnsName

Columns.Description: The region of the cluster running the stage.
Columns.Name: Region

Columns.Description: The IP Address of the node running the stage.
Columns.Name: IpAddress

Columns.Description: The subscription ID of the cluster running the stage.
Columns.Name: UserSubscriptionId

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
